data.scientific_title: Atrial Fibrillation and Hypertension: Reverse Cardiac Remodelling Post Renal Denervation
data.simplified_title: Reverse Cardiac Remodelling Post Renal Denervation
data.source_system: Patients with hypertension are at increased risk of heart rhythm disorders, yet little is known if treatment of high blood pressure will improve abnormal rhythm.  Renal denervation is a new and effective treatment for severe hypertension; this study will assess the adverse changes in heart structure and function due to severe hypertension, and investigate whether renal denervation can ameliorate these changes on a structural and electrical level.

data.name: Baker IDI Heart and Diabetes Institute
